Description: Help to keep your dad cool and up to the minute with our DAD message pocket watch. He will keep time in style and have no excuse to be late anymore. Designed with a sophisticated dad in mind, our two toned DAD pocket watch will take him everywhere from watching a little league game in the afternoon to a dinner out with his family in the evening. Even if your dad is modern, he will appreciate the inspiration from Vintage Style pocket watches that were so popular in the 1920s. Pocket watches for men will bring a hint of nostalgia to his modern wardrobe. Secured with a detachable14.75 inch curb chain that features a belt clip on the other end, this fun and fashionable Simulated Quartz movement pocket watch is sure to become one of his treasured possessions before long. With a 1.75 inch watch face diameter, it is easy to see what time it is, and the black Roman numerals set against a white background make a perfect contrast. Pocket watches for men make great choices for groomsmen gifts, for fathers day gifts or for a recent graduate to celebrate the passage of time as well.
